storyInfo: The snowstorm at the Victorian manor grows stronger by the moment. Heidi and her father have devoted themselves to maintaining Victoria's peace. During her conversation with Kal'tsit, the snow suddenly turns black as the will of Ursus approaches.

attributes.content: 13 Years Ago
8:09 P.M. \ Heavy snow
Victoria Border Autonomous Region, County of Toron, Vincent Manor
It is a great city. All Victorians should find time to pay it a visit and gaze upon its magnificence.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: So you are saying our respectable dukes have not yet arrived at a conclusion?
attributes.name: Pretentious Man

attributes.content: Yes, that is correct. They haven't yet. For the time being, Londinium is still a city without a master.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: So I take it you had the fortune and privilege to tour Londinium with the Duke of Normandy?
attributes.name: Merry Noblewoman

attributes.content: Alas, the Duke is forbidden from entering Londinium by law. Of course, he is a fine gentleman, so he would never be so presumptuous as to invite himself in, so we instead enjoyed dinner on a ship together in the Londinium countryside.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: What kind of a hero is the Duke?
attributes.name: Tipsy Businessman

attributes.content: Well... he is the most gracious and erudite of nobles. His views in economics and politics are unique and unparalleled. Not only that, but my understanding is that he is well-trained in music, and he possesses an impressive art collection, testament to his respect for the arts.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: It is because of heroes like him that Victoria remains prosperous as ever!
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: Despite not having a ruler for the past dozen or so years, Victoria has managed to maintain its stability.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the truth is that the Dukes were getting in each other's way behind the scenes, and that's not all...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: If so many Victorian nobles actually fell victim to food poisoning and hunting accidents, then the country's noble rule would've crumbled to dust long ago.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: And three years ago, your father nearly experienced that first hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: His leg is actually injured.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is a noble who is an academic enemy of my father. They were at a cocktail party together, and he made his move after the party.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: That must have been well disguised, if it was thought to be an accident.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My father had a few leads, but he didn't want this affair to get in the way of relaying intelligence.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: How many of Thomson's men are there in this manor right now?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A lot of them, such as the ones you were talking to earlier... They also paid my father's villa a visit before tonight's party.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Richard was quite critical of your father just now...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ahaha... I suppose he spoke much of it from his heart... He has had quite the rivalry with my father for the past several years...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Yet they still assemble around Thomson. Your father is a good leader.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not without your guidance, Lady Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Who could have thought back then... that the Laterano cleric who came to visit Victoria would become our most trusted mentor?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Our goals are one and the same.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit. They will get out of this unscathed... We will get out of this unscathed, will we?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Heidi...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You need to look around with your own eyes. If you truly wish to step into this world, then you cannot allow civilization's facades blind you anymore... You need to see this world yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Comforting words are meaningless. You will grow up one day.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now, unpleasant as it may be, I must say I heard a rumor from the lesser nobles and ruffians...
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: My, did they upset you?
attributes.name: Merry Noblewoman

attributes.content: Right... As you can see, it was the Dukes' graciousness that forged the peace and prosperity enjoyed by our country today.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: However, and this is something that even the traitors in Columbia are aware of, we also cannot deny that it has been a long time since Victoria has seen a rightful ruler ascend its throne.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: And what of it? Does that not go to show we are becoming ever more powerful through our own means?
attributes.name: Pretentious Man

attributes.content: You are correct, Richard, but there was also this opinion... It was naive and absurd... There was this crowd of men there each with their own goals...
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: They asked if Victoria truly needed a new ruler.
attributes.name: Count Vincent

attributes.content: They all said Uncle Vincent's too much of a coward...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: We're near the border, but we are being so complacent, not making any progress... This is our chance to fight for our rights... yet all Uncle Vincent knows to do is throwing parties in the manor.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Even this trip to Londinium. It hardly achieved any meaningful results.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: This isn't your father's opinion. Thomson is not so foolish as to let radical atmosphere get to his head.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But that's how the adults always complain to my father.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: No foolish nobles would ever receive an audience with a real Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you think that the Duke of Normandy really didn't intimidate Vincent with any harsh demands?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Toron is near the border, and there are few people here. In other words, this place is not under the influence of any major forces.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uncle Vincent...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: This nobleman may seem uninterested in anything except celebrating this false peace with music and shows, but he is actually doing his best to uphold Toron's peace. That's despite the peace here... is fragile and easily broken.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His arrogance and temperance are just at the right level to hide his thoughts well, and those who actually understand his true intentions are few and far between.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thomson would never place so much trust on a count severely lacking in courage, insight, and judgement. They may seem like they are heading down different paths, but these paths will lead them to the same destination.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hehe... It's nice to hear you say so.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, are you not going to look at your mail?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: From Londinium to Toron, these letters have made it halfway across Victoria.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How many hands has the letter passed through, and how many of them know of the whole truth of these events?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There are lotsâ€”
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Workers, newsboys, popcorn hawkers, park gardeners. They knew nothing of the letter's contents. They didn't even know who these words ultimately belong to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But now this letter has made it to Thomson, and now me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But what about the other one? The one from 'Kazdel'...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: It was handed straight to Thomson by a Sarkaz Messenger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I told him how to contact Thomson himself, but if things had gone according to plan, he would've handed this straight to me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah... but when that Sarkaz made it to Victoria...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Father did not know how the Sarkaz honor their heroes' death, so all we could do was cremate his body according to our traditions and scatter his ashes in the nomadic city's waterways.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I can't tell you his real name, but, at the very least, he died as a Messenger, and I will bring his story back to his homeland.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He won't be forgotten.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... Is this how you treat everyone?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, I was just thinking... Ah... Aaah...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Achoo!
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Oh! P-Pardon me... How unbecoming of me...!
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The snow is getting heavier. Let's head back inside.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will pay Thomson a visit once this party is over.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am sure Father will be happy.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Should I perhaps hold your arm? That way no one will be suspicious of us.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: If you think that is necessary.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay... Hehe, you're so much taller than me.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You haven't grown at all, Heidi.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take a look outside, Kal'tsit. The snow is so heavy. I haven't seen this much snow in a very long time.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You are right. A snowstorm is coming.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Heidi ponders to herself: Just how many clouds are needed to shed so many snowflakes?
The white snow is scattering in all directions, gyrating into the sky as the wind blows past.
Where the pale yellow lights cannot illuminate has been shrouded in a thick mist that covers the entire city.
The night sky tonight is without stars and moonlight.
The black tidal wave is beginning to crash upon the beaches.

attributes.content: Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Black snow...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? I'm not seeing any...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Heidi, tell everyone to keep the party venue under control.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I need about an hour's time. Don't let anyone near the garden...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can do that... but what's going on with you all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: We've got company.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: We may be on the border, but this manor belongs to a Victorian count! Who wouldâ€”
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: â€”Heidi, if I don't come back to the manor, you and your father need to keep this secret.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do not dig any deeper into this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Butâ€”
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: This is a warning as well as an order.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be safe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To the north of Sami and Ursus and to the south of Sargon... Those lands yet untrodden by man...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whether the demons and monsters that dwell there are normal creatures is yet unknown, but they are far older than any country we know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Humans have fought them for a long time. Indeed, this is a proposition worthy of further notice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Until now...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Humans can now be the masters of their own countries.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The ancient Sargon king and the powerful Kheshigs hit it off right away, and the Nightzmora's Khagan strove to conquer all lands unexplored by civilization.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The results were impressive. No non-human threat ever set foot in Sargon territory again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sami has used countless witchcrafts and sacrifices to create their Snowpriests, and, one generation after another, the sorceresses lost themselves as they battled the enemies from beyond their borders.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And Ursusâ€”You deployed the strongest elites to simply tear them to shreds. Wendigos in heavy armor or veteran war Casters.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And the Empire's ambitions are without limit. Your kind did not merely tear them to shreds.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You used the shreds of power left behind by those non-humans.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The will of Ursus drove you here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are far underestimating Victoria's might. The aura of demons lingers in your footsteps. Have you ever given any thought to where your responsibility lies?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your mind can't already be taken by the demons, Royal Guard.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: As the figure steps out into the light, the unilluminated darkness surrounding it begins to quiver.

attributes.content: I can smell the fear in you, traitor.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: It took you a while to find me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If it wasn't for the uprising and its aftermath, I would've come to lay down your punishment long ago.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: The imbeciles allowed you to escape. This has been an embarrassment, and they have already been executed for their incompetence.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Perhaps I should remind you again. The snowstorm here can bury entire cities, but they cannot erase the footsteps of a Royal Guard.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are in Victoria, and there stands the manor of a Victorian count not a hundred meters behind me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you understand the consequences of your actionsâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: â€”Consequences?
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Your threat is weak and empty. Wherever I stand, the earth beneath me belongs to the Empire of Ursus.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: You never had the right to address me, traitor, not before the word 'demon' left your lips. Soon, I will beat out of you how you came to know this secret...
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Your understanding of the 'demons' does not grant you a dialogue. You murdered an Ursus Grand Duke, and you know of our darkest secrets.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Your countless crimes... are worthy of a thousand deaths.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: It seems we won't be convincing each other for the moment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Though that applies only to... your evaluation of the situation on hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Beast, bare your fangs!
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: You can't fool me!
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Mon3tr...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Impatient braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Mon3tr, do not underestimate him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He's no normal human.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You hid a device here in the garden... No... a creature...? *Hiss*...
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: You know of the 'demons,' and you have a monster serving you. One that Ursus's vast knowledge is yet unaware of.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Perhaps your crimes have far exceeded my expectations.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Or perhaps I managed to make an impression on a Royal Guard.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *Hiss*...!
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: I won't deny it, traitor.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: But you have my curiosity. What drove you to betray our homeland...? No, no... Perhaps... my investigations did not fully uncover your entire past.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: And it looks like that is indeed the case. Unlike the criminals who escaped to Sami, it appears you still have a trick up your sleeve.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Do not get the wrong idea... It is hardly a difficult matter... to kill you.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: I suppose it's why you are staining this area around us?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You needn't concern yourself. I know what I am doing.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: â€”Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Wailing)â€”
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: *Hiss*... I did not expect it to be this hard.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: If your own flesh and blood is also as hardened, then, indeed, it makes you a formidable foe.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Mon3tr, come back. Don't chase after him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Avoid the black mist. That's not mist at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is far beyond the normal realm of Originium Arts... It looks like it has really been too long since I last dealt with the Emperor's Blade. You and your men have made remarkable progress.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You know this much about our secrets...?!
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Even the most senior Ursus scientist would never be allowed to meddle in the Royal Guards' ancient ritual...
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Ancient rituals. Yes, only the ceremonies of your crazed, self-proclaimed spiritual leaders could adorn your kinds with your demons.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're a survivor of the Valley of the Setting Sun.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *Hiss*...!
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: The Empire's will is always focused and unswerving, yet your goal seems to stray from your motherland's. At the very least, you are not that young.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You should not be fighting me, Royal Guard. Both you and I know that the job I finished was one that you and your men should've done yourselves, but never did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't be mistaken about where that right lies, traitor. You do not represent Deity Grypherburg's laws and prestige.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: If you truly witnessed the whole uprising, Royal Guard, then you should understand this more so than anyone. The Empire's rise and fall has never truly been affected by dignity and honor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let me ask you this, then. Did the last emperor ever truly look down on Victoria from the bottom of his heart?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps I do not give you enough credit, traitor.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: I will give you one last chance. Reveal your secrets, and I will grant you a dignified death.
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: Alas, given this death would have nothing to do with my own conviction, dignity was never on the table.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Elated braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: *Hiss*... *Huff*...
attributes.name: 'Emperor's Blade'

attributes.content: As the fear in the air heightens, the Royal Guard draws his blade. He is about to execute Ursus's will.
